title: Summer's over, time to get back to work
content: Summer was great, but it went by way too fast. Things are progressing with the brewery, layoffs at my job resulted in a larger workload for me and my team, and my last obstacle race of the year is next week. I started working on a new recipe management Spring Boot app (check the projects page) as a way to learn Thymeleaf templates. I'm planning to finish that up while working on improvements to the brewery website. Below I'm drinking one of our newest brews, a Golden Porter.

title: Races so far this year
content: I just completed my 4th obstacle race of the year. Spartan Beast in April, Spartan Sprint in June, Spartan Super and Tough Mudder in July. I may sign up for another Tough Mudder in October, if I get enough team mates to join up.

title: Check out my Github
content: The source code for all my projects is located on my Github. My notes, practice projects, and even my recipes are stored there.

title: Red White and Brew
content: I'm proud to be a founding member of the Red White and Brew Beer Company, to be located in/around Swedesboro, New Jersey. I also designed and host the brewery's website (currently under construction). I started brewing back in 2012 when I bought a homebrewing kit on a whim. I'd always been interested in craft beer, but once I started brewing for myself it became a passion. So when my friend Chris (also a homebrewer) asked me if I would be interested in opening a microbrewery, my answer was an emphatic yes! We plan to open mid-end of 2017.
